main event: A brief observation of a lightning-like object was reported on 15 November 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for only 1/2 second., The sighting was likely that of a meteor., The description includes mentions of air-visual guidance and radar evaluation., The report was part of Project Blue Book's investigations into UFOs., Various conclusions listed include satellite, balloon, and insufficient data.
witness description: the observer was driving an auto
